fields.name: Red Herring
fields.description: distracting from the argument at hand
fields.example_context: I hope the Republicans cut income tax because taxes unjustly restrict personal freedom.
fields.example: It's the Republicans who sent us into Iraq in the first place.
fields.improvement: I think taxes allow the government to provide services which raise the standard of living and give more people freedom to pursue what makes them happy.

fields.name: Cherry Picking
fields.description: selecting extreme examples to make a point
fields.example_context: Why should I drive instead of flying?
fields.example: Flying is so dangerous! That Malaysian Airlines flight crashed and hundreds of passengers died.
fields.improvement: Driving is more than 70 times more likely than flying to lead to fatal accidents per mile travelled, so you should fly if safety is your priority.
